\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
0 \& {(\mathrm{-, \mathrm{Rad}}(P))} \& {(-, P)} \&\& {(-, \mathrm{Top}(P))} \\
\& {\mathrm{Rad}(-, P)} \&\& {S^P(-)}
\arrow[from=1-1, to=1-2]
\arrow[from=1-2, to=1-3]
\arrow[from=1-3, to=1-5]
\arrow[two heads, from=1-3, to=2-4]
\arrow[equals, from=2-2, to=1-2]
\arrow[from=2-2, to=1-3]
\arrow[hook, from=2-4, to=1-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
